channel.title: CVE Feed for creativeon -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-43246|2024-08-19T13:35:14.212Z -- creativeon -- whmpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in creativeon WHMpress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WHMpress: from n/a through 6.2-revision-5.
